channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Advanced Recent Posts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Advanced Recent Posts

item.title: CVE-2023-0212|2023-03-06T13:34:03.634Z -- unknown -- advanced%20recent%20posts
item.description: The Advanced Recent Posts WordPress plugin through 0.6.14 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
